sentence: An ABC News reporter sought to corner Arizona gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake with one of the left’s favorite gotcha questions for Republicans: Do you think Joe Biden is the legitimate president?
author: Randy DeSoto
title: ABC Reporter Tries Gotcha Question on Kari Lake, So She Flips the Script in Brutal Take Down of MSM

sentence: pic.twitter.com/KnDC2jHXVB — Kari Lake for AZ Governor (@KariLake) February 3, 2022 At a rally former President Donald Trump held outside of Phoenix last month, Lake called the 2020 race “rotten to its core,” adding, “You don’t steal our vote” and just expect people to accept it.
author: Randy DeSoto
title: Must-See Ad: Kari Lake Lights Up Fake News Media for Its Relative Silence on 2020 Election Integrity

author: Amy Sherman
title: Jan. 6 defendants “are being held in prison without being charged.”

sentence: Greitens comments came one day after Trump's endorsed candidate for Arizona governor, Kari Lake, attacked Ronna Romney McDaniel, who remains as chairwoman of the RNC after being picked by Trump.
author: Bob Brigham
title: GOP civil war escalates as Republicans keep slamming each other in meaner and meaner terms
